content: make this adorable potted plant guaranteed to never die stitched in bernat maker minis crochet your monstera by starting with the pot that s worked in continuous rounds of single_crochet with simple increases the dirt is then stitched flat and joined to the pot with slip stitches create the plant using a mix of half double double and treble_crochet then wrap single_crochet around a pipe cleaner for a sturdy stem add safety eyes and a straight-stitched mouth for a cheerful finishing touch materials bernat® maker minis™ kit includes 10 balls 1 7 oz/50 g each 17 6 oz/500 g total 61 yds/ 56 m each 610 yds/560 m total contrast a yellow 1 ball or 25 yds/23 m contrast b brown 1 ball or 10 yds/9 m contrast c green 1 ball or 23 yds/21 m small amount of red for mouth embroidery measurement approx 6 15 cm tall with leaves fully extended
